author: Dan Ripley For Mailonline
title: Leicester v Liverpool LIVE score: EPL action | Daily Mail Online
text:
18:05 Here are a list of the weekend results from the Premier League 
Crystal Palace's victory at home to Middlesbrough are the reason Leicester City have dropped into the bottom three. Had Hull City and Sunderland won - the champions would be bottom. 
Two fixtures on that calendar featuring the Manchester derby and Southampton's clash with Arsenal were of course not played due to the League Cup final. 18:00 It's been a miserable week for Leicester City... 
And it didn't even start off that badly having recorded a respectable 2-1 Champions League defeat in Sevilla. 
But since then Claudio Ranieri has been sacked, the club have fallen into the Premier League relegation zone and to top it off the pursuit of retaining their top flight crown came to an official end on Saturday. 
So can the Foxes bounce back immediately? Good evening all and welcome to Sportsmail's live coverage of Leicester City v Liverpool. {"id":"4264390","channel":"/sport","pageUrl":"http://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-4264390/Liverpool-v-Leicester-LIVE-score-EPL-action.html","status":"running","modifiedOrder":1} 0 0
